20110118190055.000|20110118190056.000|CC1|I'M PHILLIP PALMER.             
20110118190056.000|20110118190057.000|CC1|LESLIE: AND I'M LESLIE SYKES.   
20110118190057.000|20110118190059.000|CC1|THE VICTIMS IN THIS SHOOTING    
20110118190059.000|20110118190101.000|CC1|WERE IN A PARKED CAR WHEN       
20110118190101.000|20110118190103.000|CC1|POLICE SAY TWO GUNMEN WALKED UP 
20110118190103.000|20110118190104.000|CC1|AND OPENED FIRE.                
20110118190104.000|20110118190106.000|CC1|THE MOTIVE REMAINS A MYSTERY.   
20110118190106.000|20110118190108.000|CC1|IT HAPPENED ON WEST 98th STREET.

20110118190110.000|20110118190111.000|CC1|THERE LIVE WITH WHAT

20110118190116.000|20110118190118.000|CC1|THE SHOOTER -- THIS HAPPENED    
20110118190118.000|20110118190119.000|CC1|AROUND 9:00.                    
20110118190119.000|20110118190120.000|CC1|THE SUSPECT APPROACHED THE      
20110118190120.000|20110118190122.000|CC1|PARKED VEHICLE WHERE I'M        
20110118190122.000|20110118190132.000|CC1|STANDING, FIRED SEVERAL  ROUNDS 
20110118190132.000|20110118190133.000|CC1|AND TOOK OFF.

20110118190141.000|20110118190143.000|CC1|THE GUNSHOTS ERUPT SHORTLY      
20110118190143.000|20110118190144.000|CC1|AFTER 9:00 P.M.

20110118190150.000|20110118190152.000|CC1|FAMILY HOME ON 98th STREET.

20110118192153.000|20110118192154.000|CC1|FOR SOME OF THEIR CANINE UNITS  
20110118192154.000|20110118192158.000|CC1|TO COME OUT SO LIKELY THAT IS   
20110118192158.000|20110118192200.000|CC1|IN THEIR EFFORTS TO FIND THE    
20110118192200.000|20110118192202.000|CC1|PERSON WHO HAS DONE THE         
20110118192202.000|20110118192202.000|CC1|SHOOTING.

20110118192922.000|20110118192923.000|CC1|AREA, WE'RE ASKING TO YOU STAY  
20110118192923.000|20110118192924.000|CC1|INSIDE YOUR HOUSE.

20110118192953.000|20110118192954.000|CC1|AVAILABLE WHEN THEY CAN COME

20110118193805.000|20110118193807.000|CC1|IF YOU LIVE IN THAT AREA, YOU   
20110118193807.000|20110118193809.000|CC1|WILL ALSO BE ABLE TO GET        
20110118193809.000|20110118193811.000|CC1|INFORMATION A LITTLE BIT LATER.

20110118193813.000|20110118193817.000|CC1|AT THE SCENE, EYEWITNESS AT THE

20110118194542.000|20110118194543.000|CC1|VICTIMS WAS SHOT, IT LOOKED

20110118194546.000|20110118194547.000|CC1|LESLIE: RIGHT.                  
20110118194547.000|20110118194553.000|CC1|AND NOW WE'RE GOING TO HEAR

20110118195359.000|20110118195400.000|CC1|PHILLIP: WHAT IS THE PROCEDURE  
20110118195400.000|20110118195403.000|CC1|AS FAR AS WHEN STUDENTS GO ON   
20110118195403.000|20110118195403.000|CC1|TO CAMPUS?                      
20110118195403.000|20110118195406.000|CC1|CERTAINLY FOR THOSE OF US WHO   
20110118195406.000|20110118195407.000|CC1|ARE BEYOND 40 AND PARENTS, WE
